title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When changing the text in the StyledText widget with word wrap enabled, the widget experiences multiple unnecessary redraws.
EB: This issue should be resolved so that there is at most one redraw for each visible line. To reproduce the issue, follow the steps below.
SR:
1. Open the application containing the StyledText widget.
2. Enable word wrap in the StyledText widget.
3. Make a text change, such as adding or deleting a character.
4. Observe that the StyledText widget undergoes multiple redraws instead of one for each visible line.
